turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hey there, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order three small pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let's get the order started. what did you want on those 3 small pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One just cheese, one sausage and bacon, and one Hawaiian pizza. All of those with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure thing. you want 3 small pizzas. 1 cheese, 1 sausage and bacon, and 1 hawaiian pizza. all with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $36.55 is the total, did you want the order to be placed now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i've submitted the order. it'll be freshly baked and ready to b picked up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that'll be it. Thank you.
